word: In this connection Mark gives a most precious statement that must not be overlooked. The angel said to the women, \93Go your way, tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee.\94 What a comforting message was thus given to the women to give to Peter. The last look Jesus had given Peter was after the disciple\92s thrice-repeated denial. Peter was not forgotten by Christ, and this mention of his name signified to him that he was forgiven. . . .
